items.title: Booker’s Bourbon Just Launched ‘The Reserves,’ Its First New Release in 5 Years
items.excerpt: Bourbon Heritage Month is off to a good start, as Booker’s Bourbon has just introduced its first new whiskey innovation since 2019. Booker’s Bourbon ‘The Reserves’ is the first of what’s to become an annual, limited-release series by master distiller Freddie Noe. It’s meant to…
